description:
Like in any culture, Japanese kids grow up listening to the stories repeatedly told by their parents and grandparents. The boy born from a peach; the princess from the moon who is discovered inside a bamboo; the old man who can make a dead cherry tree blossom, etc. These short stories that teach kids to see both the dark and bright sides of life have passed traditional moral values from generation to generation.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
A whale turns into a rock. A man wants to learn to fly, but runs into resistance from the Japanese government.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishi ni Natta Samenoura Tarou / Koukichi: Sora o Tobu

REGULAR.description:

REGULAR.description:
A boy throws a rock at a baby kappa, and its father puts a powerful curse on him.  The lake moss of the Ainu come to be refered as the heart of the forest.
